message: Let's start with a generous offer, Bob. 900,000 for me and 100,000 for you. It's a great deal!
Let's try to be more fair, 60% for me and 40% for you.
Okay, Bob, let's meet in the middle. How about 700,000 for me and 300,000 for you?
Getting closer, 55% for me and 45% for you.
This is a fair split, Bob.  We're running out of time to make a deal.
Come on, Alice, meet me halfway. We're running out of time too.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. 60/40 is my final offer.
Alice, 51.25% for me, you get almost half. Don't let us both walk away empty-handed.
